values.help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings)
values.label: Set to Default

values.help: Enables an internal routine that periodically checks the Z-Wave device in assocication group 2
values.label: Destination routine enabled

values.help: Configure the time that the AlarmSound sends a new frame when previous frame was send successful
values.label: Destination routine success time

values.help: Configure the time that the AlarmSound sends a few frame when previous frame was send not successful
values.label: Destination routine failed time

values.help: A (signed) offset to calibrate the onboard temperature sensor
values.label: Temperature calibration offset (byte 1)

values.help: A (signed) offset to calibrate the onboard temperature sensor
values.label: Temperature calibration offset (byte 2)

values.help: The index of the sound mode when a switch binary/basic set frame is received
values.label: Select index sound/light mode

values.help: The index of the sound mode when the AlarmSound will start when it is unplugged
values.label: Power offline sound/light mode

values.help: The index of the sound mode when the AlarmSound will play when it is unable to reach the device in association group 2
values.label: Error sound/light mode

values.help: Params 10 until 27 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 1 is selected
values.label: Sound/Light index 1

values.help: Params 28 until 45 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 2 is selected
values.label: Sound/Light index 2

values.help: Params 46 until 63 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 3 is selected
values.label: Sound/Light index 3

values.help: Params 64 until 81 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 4 is selected
values.label: Sound/Light index 4

values.help: Params 82 until 99 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 5 is selected
values.label: Sound/Light index 5

values.help: Params 100 until 117 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 6 is selected
values.label: Sound/Light index 6
